definition.text: The GitHub Program allows you to receive some tokens for starting to get involved with the project!

paragraphs.text: There are three ways to gain more tokens with the Github Program. Doing all three will land you a nice Token bonus!
Give a star to the Superalgos repository.
Fork the Superalgos repository to your Github account.
Watch the Superalgos repository with your Github account.
Adding the Github program is just like adding the Airdrop Program! On the Onboarding Programs node click Add Github Program.
